analysis.description:
ERC20 (/unique_chucks/3/0x24a77c1f17c547105e14813e517be06b0040aa76.sol#109-123) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/3/0x24a77c1f17c547105e14813e517be06b0040aa76.sol#111-112)
	-transferFrom (/unique_chucks/3/0x24a77c1f17c547105e14813e517be06b0040aa76.sol#112-113)
	-approve (/unique_chucks/3/0x24a77c1f17c547105e14813e517be06b0040aa76.sol#113-114)

StandardToken (/unique_chucks/3/0x24a77c1f17c547105e14813e517be06b0040aa76.sol#127-177) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/3/0x24a77c1f17c547105e14813e517be06b0040aa76.sol#143-148)
	-transferFrom (/unique_chucks/3/0x24a77c1f17c547105e14813e517be06b0040aa76.sol#150-159)
	-approve (/unique_chucks/3/0x24a77c1f17c547105e14813e517be06b0040aa76.sol#159-173)

LiveStarsTokenPresale.doPurchase (/unique_chucks/3/0x24a77c1f17c547105e14813e517be06b0040aa76.sol#268-281) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- token.balanceOf(msg.sender) == 0

Reentrancy in LiveStarsTokenPresale.doPurchase (/unique_chucks/3/0x24a77c1f17c547105e14813e517be06b0040aa76.sol#268-281):
	External calls:
	- assert(bool)(token.balanceOf(msg.sender) + tokens <= purchaseLimit) (/unique_chucks/3/0x24a77c1f17c547105e14813e517be06b0040aa76.sol#272-275)
	- token.balanceOf(msg.sender) == 0 (/unique_chucks/3/0x24a77c1f17c547105e14813e517be06b0040aa76.sol#275-277)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- collected (/unique_chucks/3/0x24a77c1f17c547105e14813e517be06b0040aa76.sol#277-278)

Reentrancy in LiveStarsTokenPresale.doPurchase (/unique_chucks/3/0x24a77c1f17c547105e14813e517be06b0040aa76.sol#268-281):
	External calls:
	- assert(bool)(token.balanceOf(msg.sender) + tokens <= purchaseLimit) (/unique_chucks/3/0x24a77c1f17c547105e14813e517be06b0040aa76.sol#272-275)
	- token.balanceOf(msg.sender) == 0 (/unique_chucks/3/0x24a77c1f17c547105e14813e517be06b0040aa76.sol#275-277)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- currentBalance (/unique_chucks/3/0x24a77c1f17c547105e14813e517be06b0040aa76.sol#279-281)
	- investorCount (/unique_chucks/3/0x24a77c1f17c547105e14813e517be06b0040aa76.sol#277)

Reentrancy in LiveStarsTokenPresale.doPurchase (/unique_chucks/3/0x24a77c1f17c547105e14813e517be06b0040aa76.sol#268-281):
	External calls:
	- assert(bool)(token.balanceOf(msg.sender) + tokens <= purchaseLimit) (/unique_chucks/3/0x24a77c1f17c547105e14813e517be06b0040aa76.sol#272-275)
	- token.balanceOf(msg.sender) == 0 (/unique_chucks/3/0x24a77c1f17c547105e14813e517be06b0040aa76.sol#275-277)
	- token.transfer(msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_chucks/3/0x24a77c1f17c547105e14813e517be06b0040aa76.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/3/0x24a77c1f17c547105e14813e517be06b0040aa76.sol)
